column4: this may sound crazy, but when I load ipw3945, my keyboard stop responding and cpu shoots up to 50%
do you have a wireless kb?
what kind of cpu load?  i/o (disk, dark blue) or processing (light blue)?  you can see the different kinds of cpu load via gnome-system-monitor
hm how did you spacebar break?  damage to the kb circuit?  maybe it's related?
oh. hmm well check the cpu thing
thanks.. it appears I need to know the keycode of the space, that could be a problem. :P
doesn't go by ascii codes though, they unique to every keyboard.
use xev to grab the keycode for space?
well maybe it's 65 for my KB
i think i use the standard 103 kb or w/e it is, it's probably 65 for most people?
got it working, thanks... guess i need some new AAAs
